product_name: KIALOA Bacon Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Why choose the incredibly durable, highly affordable performance of the KIALOA Bacon Adjustable Stand Up Paddle? Because, as the KIALOA designers suspect, everybody loves bacon! Innovative LeverLock(R) handle makes it really easy to adjust the length of the paddle on the fly. Adjusts from 70 - 86 in. for multiple paddling applications and different size paddlers. To adjust length, simply open the lever on the handle, adjust the length to the hash marks on the shaft that corresponds to your height, and paddle away. Fiberglass and nylon shaft feels warm to the touch and offers a bit of flex on every stroke. Reinforced fiberglass blade offers rugged durability. Comfortable grip fits right into the palm of your hand.
short_description: Why choose the incredibly durable, highly affordable performance of the KIALOA Bacon Adjustable Stand Up Paddle? Because, as the KIALOA designers suspect, everybody loves bacon!
